content.rendered:
Directed by Mridul Toolsidas

Written by Mridul Toolsidas. Mridul Toolsidas

Cast Sanjay Dutt (Mohammad Salaam). Rajeev Kapoor (Toolsidaas (as Rajiv Kapoor)). Varun Buddhadev (Midi / Toolsidaas Junior). Ankur Vikal (KK Burman). Sara Arjun (Pia, Midi’s friend). Rajesh Bhatt (Marwadi Seth). Chinmay Chandraunshuh (Goti). Ravi Shankar Jaiswal (Reporter). Tasveer Kamil (Toolsidas’ wife). Aloke Sengupta (Club Manager (as Alok Sengupta)). Dalip Tahil (Jimmy Tandon). Benjamin Yangal (Fayaz)

Languages Hindi

Producers Vinod Bhanushali. Rajesh Bhatt. Shiv Chanana. Ashutosh Gowariker. Konark Gowariker. Sunita Gowariker. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Krishan Kumar

Production Ashutosh Gowariker. T-Series Films
